com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils

Class GroundItemsInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.InventoryBase
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils.GroundItemsInventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack>, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory

    public class GroundItemsInventory
extends com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.InventoryBase
    Allows you to use items on the ground as an Inventory
    Is of a dynamic size; the last item is always null
    If this item is set, a new item is spawned
